hanzi-su-wiki:
執

Значения

Арестовывать, брать, исполнять, иметь дело; упорство

Мнемоника

Искажено. Справа — большой 大 человек, на которого охотятся с рогатиной 羊, преступник 幸. Наказывать поркой (рука с палкой 丸), арестовывать.

Варианты

执
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhí
to execute (a plan); to grasp
выполнить (план); схватить

purpleculture_examples:
執行 [ zhí xíng ]: to implement; to carry out; to execute; to run
執法 [ zhí fǎ ]: to enforce a law; law enforcement
執政 [ zhí zhèng ]: to hold power; in office
執政黨 [ zhí zhèng dǎng ]: ruling party; the party in power
執業 [ zhí yè ]: to work in a profession (e.g. doctor, lawyer); practitioner; professional

heisig_chinese_memo: Your friend gives you a good fortune pill but you don't know what's going to happen so you clench your friend's arm in anticipation. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: tenacious, happiness, ten, needle, stand up, vase, fat man, musashimaru, nine, baseball, drop, ten2, needle2
Keyword_KANJIDIC: tenacious, take hold, grasp, take to heart
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: цепкий, Возьмитесь, схватывание, принимать близко к сердцу
koohiiStory1: Tenacious-D is happy band led by a fat man. (It´s Tenacious-D time, ya muthafucka´, gwaoh!).
koohiiStory2: To be tenacious, you need to have deep stores of happiness (so troubles don´t discourage you) and you need to be big and round (so hunger doesn´t drive you to give up). The most tenacious person of all time was happy round Buddha!
jp_example_words:
執着(しゅうじゃく): attachment, adhesion, tenacity
執筆(しっぴつ): writing
jp_readingExamples: 執務 (しつむ), 執筆 (しっぴつ), 確執 (かくしつ), 執る (と.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Happiness is a circle that's tenacious. In other words, we're all in this circle/cycle where we do whatever we can to grab onto happiness and hold it as tightly as we can.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Be tenacious about happiness in your life. No matter how many times it slips away, don't give up. Keep going after it, because it will absolutely come back if you're tenacious enough.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Happiness is as tenacious as a shih tzu (しつ) with a shoe (しゅう). That little dog does not want to give up on the shoe, no matter what's happening around it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Will someone take the shoe sometimes? Yeah, but the shih tzu doesn't give up. That's how you need to be with happiness. Kids, be tenacious!
Ru_Meaning: tenacious, take hold, grasp, take to heart

    執心しゅうしん
  • склонность, пристрастие к чему-л., увлечение кем-л
    • warodai

Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you have happiness (幸) all round (丸) you should hold on to it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I clench my bottle of pills with my fingers instead of putting them in my pocket to make extra sure they are safe.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jinwen from "丮" from "㚔", "㚔" is also a sound symbol. "帮" is like a kneeling person who stretches out his hands, "㚔" is like a handcuffed torture device, and the word " hold " is like a person's hands being chained. Will use torture to detain a prisoner or prisoner. The original meaning is detention, and later it is the meaning of execution and control.

Later, the inscription "丮" and "㚔" were separated. Early Bronze " Ji " from the lower or increase " only " (Executive parent B Jazz, this is " Ji " for the mouth of the shape of the head, and " owe " nearly-shaped), the latter " only " into a false " female " Shape (multiple friends tripod).

The oracle bone inscriptions express detention and are also used as the name of a person or a clan. Jin Wen said that he was detained, and many friends said: "The three of you are in charge," and Qin Gongzhong said, "You are the deacon of Qin."

"Shuowen": "Holding, arresting criminals. Cong from 㚔, 㚔 also sounds."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jinwen from "丮" from "㚔", "㚔" is also a sound symbol. "帮" is like a kneeling person who stretches out his hands, "㚔" is like a handcuffed torture device, and the word " hold " is like a person's hands being chained. Will use torture to detain a prisoner or prisoner. The original meaning is detention, and later it is the meaning of execution and control.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「丮」從「㚔」，「㚔」亦是聲符。「丮」象跪坐的人伸出雙手，「㚔」象銬鎖刑具，「執」字象一人雙手被銬鎖之形。會以刑具拘執俘虜或囚犯之意，本義為拘執，後引申為執行、執掌之意。

　　後來金文人形「丮」與「㚔」分離。早期金文「丮」下部或加從「止」(執父乙爵，此器「丮」的頭部作張口之形，與「欠」形近)，後期「止」訛變為「女」形(多友鼎)。

　　甲骨文表示拘執，又用作人名或氏族名。金文表示拘執，多友鼎：「執訊三人」，又表示執掌，秦公鐘：「柔燮百邦，于秦執事。」

　　《說文》：「執，捕罪人也。从丮从㚔，㚔亦聲。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「丮」從「㚔」，「㚔」亦是聲符。「丮」象跪坐的人伸出雙手，「㚔」象銬鎖刑具，「執」字象一人雙手被銬鎖之形。會以刑具拘執俘虜或囚犯之意，本義為拘執，後引申為執行、執掌之意。

甲金文從「 丮 」從「 㚔 」，「 㚔 」亦是聲符。「 丮 」象跪坐的人伸出雙手，「 㚔 」象銬鎖刑具，「 執 」字象一人雙手被銬鎖之形。會以刑具拘執俘虜或囚犯之意，本義為拘執，後引申為執行、執掌之意。 後來金文人形「 丮 」與「 㚔 」分離。早期金文「 丮 」下部或加從「 止 」(執父乙爵，此器「 丮 」的頭部作張口之形，與「 欠 」形近)，後期「 止 」訛變為「 女 」形(多友鼎)。 甲骨文表示拘執，又用作人名或氏族名。金文表示拘執，多友鼎：「執訊三人」，又表示執掌，秦公鐘：「柔燮百邦，于秦執事。」 《說文》：「執，捕罪人也。从丮从㚔，㚔亦聲。」
Jia Jinwen from " 丮" from " 㚔", " 㚔" is also a sound symbol. " 帮" is like a kneeling person who stretches out his hands, " 㚔" is like a handcuffed torture device, and the word " hold" is like a person's hands being chained. Will use torture to detain a prisoner or prisoner. The original meaning is detention, and later it is the meaning of execution and control. Later, the inscription " 丮" and " 㚔" were separated. Early Bronze " Ji" from the lower or increase " only" (Executive parent B Jazz, this is " Ji" for the mouth of the shape of the head, and " owe" nearly-shaped), the latter " only" into a false " female" Shape (multiple friends tripod). The oracle bone inscriptions express detention and are also used as the name of a person or a clan. Jin Wen said that he was detained, and many friends said: "The three of you are in charge," and Qin Gongzhong said, "You are the deacon of Qin." "Shuowen": "Holding, arresting criminals. Cong from 㚔, 㚔 also sounds."

執字的基本解释

執
zhí
见“执”。

執字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》之入切，入緝，章。］
亦作“瓡1”。“执1”的繁体字。
(1)拘捕。
(2)拿；持。
(3)持守。
(4)主持；掌管。
(5)控制；统御。
(6)操持；从事。
(7)行；施行。
(8)固执；坚持。
(9)依据；遵照。
(10)判断。
(11)结成。参见“執讎”。
(12)朋友；至交。
(13)通“縶”。
(14)通“慹”。参见“執服”。
(15)通“蟄”。
(16)通“摯”。殷代的世家大族。
(17)通“墊1”。陷下。
(18)姓。殷祖己之后迁于挚，分为挚执二姓。《随巢子》有执无鬼。

執字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　執； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页231第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】之入切【正韻】質入切，?音汁。守也，持也。【書·大禹謨】允執厥中。　又處也。【禮·樂記】師乙曰：請誦其所聞，吾子自執焉。　又塞也。【左傳·僖二十八年】子玉使伯棼請戰曰：非敢必有功也，願以聞執讒慝之口。　又父之友曰執友。【禮·曲禮】見父之執，不問不敢對。【後漢·馬援傳】援爲梁松父執，松貴拜援牀下，援不之答。　又捕也。【禮·檀弓】肆諸市朝，而妻妾執。【孟子】執之而已。　又姓。又執失代，三字姓。　又與慹同。【前漢·朱博傳】豪强執服。【註】謂畏威懾服也。　本作?，省作執。亦作瓡。

考證：〔【書·大禹謨】允執其中。〕　謹照原其改厥。

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

暂无。

(18) Last name. After Yin Zuji moved to Zhi, he was divided into two surnames: Zhizhi. "Suichaozi" has no ghosts.

Name meaning

zhí
вм. 执
Radicals: 幸, 丸  (happiness, circle)
Meaning Mnemonic
Happiness is a circle that's tenacious. In other words, we're all in this circle/cycle where we do whatever we can to grab onto happiness and hold it as tightly as we can.
Be tenacious about happiness in your life. No matter how many times it slips away, don't give up. Keep going after it, because it will absolutely come back if you're tenacious enough.
Reading Mnemonic
Happiness is as tenacious as a shih tzu (しつ) with a shoe (しゅう). That little dog does not want to give up on the shoe, no matter what's happening around it.
Will someone take the shoe sometimes? Yeah, but the shih tzu doesn't give up. That's how you need to be with happiness. Kids, be tenacious!
